entry.answer: A) हरिपिङ्गो • "हरिपिङ्गो" (Hari-pinga) directly refers to Krishna's golden radiance. • "वासुदेव" (Vasudeva) is a title, not a description of appearance. • Other options are unrelated to the golden hue.

entry.question:
**Khāṇḍava-dāha Parva 214.32 a-b** *उपसृष्टं तु तं कृष्णौ भ्राजमानं द्विजोत्तमम् | अर्जुनो ... तूर्णमुत्पत्य तस्थतुः ||३२||*
Who stood up quickly after the radiant figure approached?
A) Arjuna and Krishna B) Bhima and Duryodhana C) Yudhiṣṭhira and Drona D) Karna and Drona
entry.answer: A) Arjuna and Krishna • The verse explicitly names Arjuna and Krishna. • Other options are not mentioned in this context. • "वासुदेव" (Vasudeva) is Krishna's epithet.
